properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE ||' [' ||NVL(COM, 0) ||']' "BOARD_TITLE" , MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') "CREATE_DT", READ_COUNT FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" m USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT BOARD_NO , COUNT(*) "COM" FROM "COMMENT" GROUP BY BOARD_NO) USING(BOARD_NO) ORDER BY CREATE_DT DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, READ_COUNT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE ||' [' ||NVL(COM, 0) ||']' "BOARD_TITLE" , MEMBER_NM, READ_COUNT , CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DT FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" m USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT BOARD_NO , COUNT(*) "COM" FROM "COMMENT" GROUP BY BOARD_NO) USING(BOARD_NO) ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
